text: Mauritius–Spain relations are the bilateral and diplomatic relations between these two countries. Mauritius does not have an embassy in Spain, but his embassy in Paris, France, is accredited to Spain.List of foreign embassies in Spain Lista de consulados extranjeros en España Spain does not have an embassy in Mauritius but its embassy in Pretoria, South Africa, is accredited for this country.Ficha de Mauricio Office of Diplomatic Information. Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation. Section: Spanish Representation Data. == Diplomatic relations == Spain established diplomatic relations with Mauricio on May 30, 1979. The Spanish Embassy to Mauritius has residence in Pretoria (South Africa). The Embassy of Mauritius accredited in Spain is its Embassy in Paris.Ficha de Mauricio Office of Diplomatic Information. Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation. Section: Diplomatic relations. Spain has actively participated, through the Spanish Embassy in Pretoria, in the Political Dialogues held between the European Union and the Mauritian authorities. == Economic relations == Since its independence in 1968, Mauricio has seen significant growth, going from being a low-income country to having one of the largest per capita income on the continent, with intermediate incomes and a diversified economy.Ficha de Mauricio Oficina de Información Diplomática. Ministerio de Asuntos exteriores y Cooperación. Sección: Relaciones económicas. Major sectors such as sugar (90% of crops and 25% of exports), fisheries or textiles weigh in the economy of Mauritius. However, Mauritius has oriented its economy towards services. == Cooperation == Although Mauricio is not a priority or preferential country within the Master Plan of Spanish cooperation, Spain is present in the cooperation efforts through which the European Union carries out.Ficha de Mauricio Office of Diplomatic Information. Ministry of Foreign Affairs and Cooperation. Section: Cooperation. ==See also== * Foreign relations of Mauritius * Foreign relations of Spain == References == Spain Mauritius
title: Mauritius–Spain relations
